wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Dannatt (born  (1965-11-20) 20 November 1965) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Hull FC, St. Helens and Hull Kingston Rovers, as a prop, or second-row, i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12.
